quote: Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself. – Oprah Winfrey
fact: One quarter of the bones in your body are in your feet.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
Wife: Honey I’m pregnant.

Me: Well…. what do we do now?

Wife: Well, I guess we should go to a baby doctor.

Me: Hm.. I think I’d be a lot more comfortable going to an adult doctor.
